Class DailyAppointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Appointment
      • DailyAppointment

  • public class DailyAppointment
extends Appointment
    Assignment 1, Spring 2015: The DailyApointment class holds information about a type of date,GregorianCalendar object and description of appointment and computes whether given date is a daily occurrence for that specific date
    Author:
    E Cross
